metadata.title: CVE-2006-2692 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in aMuleWeb for AMule before 2.1.2allow remote attackers to read arbitrary image, HTML, or PHP files viaunknown vectors, probably related to directory traversal.

criterions.comment: amule: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
